title: I just won a game, and it wasn't recorded, and I didn't get any LP for it.
body: It was a 45-50 minute game of 1v9, and I'm not going to be too happy if I don't get the LP I deserve for carrying the game and sitting down and using 50 minutes on it.

replies.body: Hey guys, I'm hoping this can fix up too but there's no guarantees.  Due to today's server issues, it sounds like a lot of matches might not have been saved.  There is a chance for the system to try and push it through, but it might not happen for everyone.  I'm sorry about that.  :(

Same. Had an incredible comeback, where I was hoping for an S- rank and a box..and then this hit and its not recorded and I got nothing

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qc7jblpaPdM
Yea I was going to get my last S for a mastery 7 token.. and no LP from the win and no ranking...
Same. Hope they can fix this issue.
